title: Box! Kira Ito Tanpenshuu

description:
Description :
        A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter.

BOOTH page, Pixiv preview

List of Stories (in bold = scanlated):

01. ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.
One-shot version of Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san.

02. 一描き下ろし後日話

03. My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

04. Four Patterns of Love (4つの恋模様): Original on Pixiv.

05. The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

06. To You at 17 (17歳のキミへ。): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

07. Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on Twitter.

08. Seeing the Ocean With an Angel (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

09. WORLD END WANKO: Original on Twitter.

10. The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

11. The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years (100年生きた猫の話): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

12. Taciturn Shimono and His Girlfriend (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

13. The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.

14. The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on Pixiv, Twitter.
